newCredential.title: New Credential

modal.title: New Credential

errors.futureError: The date must be earlier than today
errors.pastError: The graduation date must be later than the start date
errors.noGroupSelected: You must select a group before continuing

form.logoHint: Recommended Image Size: 80x80px. Format: PNG or JPG.

registration.acceptSeedPhraseToContinue: You must check that you understand the importance of the seed phrase to continue

downloadWallet.title: Download LocalWallet
downloadWallet.subtitle: Download and execute this file to create the wallet that will allow you to access and operate Atala

password.title: Create your Password
password.info: You must create a password which will encrypt the data in your local wallet

mnemonic.title: Your Seed Phrase...
mnemonic.explanation: Your seed phrase is your personal key that gives you access yo your account. Without it you will not be able to access any of your records or funds in case you lose your device or quite the app.
mnemonic.request: Please store your seed phrase securely before proceeding.
mnemonic.warning: I understand that if I lose my seed phrase I will not be able to access my account.

validation.title: Verify Seed Phrase
validation.subtitle: Enter the correct words of your seed phrase bellow.
validation.validationRequired: You must verify the words to continue
validation.wordMissmatch: The written word doesn't match the one of the Seed Phrase

organizationInfo.title: We need some data...
organizationInfo.subtitle: Please enter your Organization info so you can start using the application.
organizationInfo.name: Organization Name

congratulations.title: Congrats!

congratulations.info: Login to Atala using your password. Remember to have your local wallet running in the computer.

welcome.title: Welcome back!
welcome.subtitle: This is a placeholder with info that is important for the logged user.

errors.connectionCreation: The connection could not be created

personalInformation.title: Personal Information
personalInformation.explanation: Please fill in the following information that will be displayed in your credential. You will not be able to change this once the credential is issued.

sendCredentials.title: Congrats!
sendCredentials.subtitle: Your personal information has been verified successfully. Your Credential is ready to be issued.

finishInfo.title: Check your phone!

finishInfo.howToSee: Open Atala Prism App and check your Dashboard to see your

scanQRInfo.explanation: Scan this QR to start a connection between you and this Issuer.
scanQRInfo.step1: Open Atala Prism on your phone.
scanQRInfo.step3: When the camera is activated, point your phone towards this screen to scan the code
